attributes.action: Force the reduction of interest rates on all fixed rate mortgages held buy (Northern Rock, RBS, Lloyds TSB  and HBOS)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Now that the Ownership of majority share holding in RBS, Lloyd’s TSB and full ownership of Northern rock, they hold a large number of fixed rate mortgages, What is the reason for not making these back reduce there rates to be closer to the bank of England interest rate as this would I am sure reduce the number of house repossessions, give many families more money to spend and hence benefit the UK economy, the cut in V.A.T means pennies for most family’s forcing a cut in interest rates would put £100’s  monthly into the purses of many families
I would like support in suggesting Gordon Brown to consider these measures
